title: "Motion-Robotics Ltd to demonstrate at The Department for Transport, Drone Pathfinder Catalyst showcase in Milton Keynes stadium"
excerpt: "Southampton based robotics company Motion-Robotics Ltd will be demonstrating their new non-cooperative aircraft detection system for autonomous drones. The event will be held at Milton Keynes stadium and hosted by UK innovation agency Catapult connected places."
